name: Tom the Pigeon
description:
Tom the Pigeon is an ultimate pigeon simulator game.

The goal is to poop the people and cars with controlling Tom.

You need to reach 150 Chaos Points, to hit a man or a car gives you 1 Chaos Point. You have got 30 poops, but you can get new poops if you go to the old man on the St. Mark's Square and have some bread.

Enjoy the game :D
